clinical_study.brief_title: Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care
clinical_study.official_title: Targeted Lifestyle Change (TLC) Group Prenatal Care for Obese Women at High Risk for Gestational Diabetes: a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: To conduct a randomized trial to determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal and neonatal outcomes in women at high risk for developing gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM).

detailed_description.textblock: Long term, the investigator aims to test the central hypothesis that those in TLC will have better maternal and neonatal outcomes than those in TC. The objective is to conduct a randomized trial to determine the effect of TLC group prenatal care on birthweight and neonatal body composition, maternal healthy lifestyle and diabetes-related outcomes, delivery and neonatal outcomes, and psychosocial stress and depression.

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of TLC group prenatal care on birth weight
primary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant weight in grams

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of TLC group prenatal care on neonatal length
primary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant length in cm

primary_outcome.measure: Effects on TLC group prenatal care on neonatal head circumference
primary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant head circumference in cm

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of TLC group prenatal care on infant skinfold thickness
primary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant skinfold thickness of ilium, thigh, triceps, and subscapular

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to the time of delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing maternal diagnosis of gestational diabetes using 2-step method(1-hour glucose challenge test, 3-hour glucose tolerance test, need for medication)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At enrollment, the last study visit/delivery, and 4-12 weeks postpartum
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on physical activity and eating behavior survey
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal gestational weight gain

secondary_outcome.measure: Maternal hypertensive disorders of pregnancy including gestational hypertension, chronic hypertension, preeclampsia, eclampsia, and HELLP
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal hypertensive disorders of pregnancy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to the time of delivery
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on number of prenatal visits attended

secondary_outcome.measure: Rates of maternal postpartum visit attendance for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on postpartum visit attendance

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of maternal contraception initiation for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal postpartum contraception initiation

secondary_outcome.measure: Breastfeeding rates among those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal breastfeeding
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal postpartum weight retention

secondary_outcome.measure: Postpartum 2 hour glucose tolerance testing (if applicable)
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal glucose tolerance testing

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 12 weeks postpartum
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal insulin resistance (fasting and 30 min insulin).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, up to 12 weeks postpartum
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal insulin sensitivity (fasting and 30 min insulin).

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessing prenatal care patient satisfaction for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care using a satisfaction survey.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal prenatal care satisfaction
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant gestational age at delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: Induction of labor rates for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal induction of labor

secondary_outcome.measure: Mode of delivery for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC)on maternal mode of delivery

secondary_outcome.measure: Neonatal shoulder dystocia rates for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant shoulder dystocia
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant APGAR score
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant cord blood analytes, c-peptide.

secondary_outcome.measure: Neonatal cord blood analytes of pH for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant cord blood analytes, pH.

secondary_outcome.measure: Neonatal cord blood analytes of base excess for those in TLC compared to traditional prenatal care.
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant cord blood analytes, base excess.
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant NICU admission
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant hypoglycemia
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant hematocrit
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant jaundice
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant respiratory distress syndrome
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on infant stillbirth
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal depression using Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale
Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal stress using the perceived stress scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the effect of TLC on psychosocial stress and depression using the pregnancy distress questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal distress

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the effect of TLC on psychosocial stress and depression using the life events checklist
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal life events

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the effect of TLC on psychosocial stress and depression using the generalized anxiety disorder-7 test
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal anxiety

secondary_outcome.measure: Determine the effect of TLC on psychosocial stress and depression using the Munich Chronotype Questionnaire (MCTQ)
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the effect of Targeted Lifestyle Change Group Prenatal Care (TLC) on maternal sleep hygiene.

arm_group.description: TLC will start in the late first trimester or early second trimester and run for ~6-10 sessions. Groups of 2-10 consented women, with two or more GDM risk factors, will meet under the supervision of an obstetric provider (nurse practitioner or MD) and co-facilitator (health educator, nutritionist, or nurse) for two-hour sessions. A major focus of TLC will be education, and much of each visit will be spent on pregnancy, exercise/nutrition education, and behavioral health.

Subjects randomized to routine care will receive their prenatal care with their primary obstetric provider. Patients are seen for 10-15 minutes every four weeks until 28 weeks' gestation, every two weeks (or more by provider discretion) until 37 weeks and weekly until delivery. Visits focus on routine screening tests and prenatal care. Traditional care participants will receive a phone call once a month, until 28 weeks gestation, from a nurse practitioner to check-in on pregnancy goals, healthy eating, and exercise. Each subject's medical chart will be reviewed for demographics, antenatal management, maternal and neonatal outcomes.

intervention.description: TLC will start in the late first trimester or early second trimester and run for ~6-10 sessions. Groups of 2-10 consented women, with two or more GDM risk factors, will meet under the supervision of an obstetric provider (nurse practitioner or MD) and co-facilitator (health educator, nutritionist, or nurse) for two-hour sessions. A major focus of TLC will be education, and much of each visit will be spent on pregnancy, exercise/nutrition education, and behavioral health.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- English speaking
- ≤16 weeks' gestation
- Two or more of the following GDM risk factors:
- BMI≥25
- Physical inactivity
- First degree relative with diabetes
- High risk race or ethnicity (African American, Latino, Native American, Asian American, Pacific Islander)
- Prior infant weighing ≥ 4,000 g
- Prior GDM
- Hypertension (140/90 mm Hg or receiving treatment)
- High-density lipoprotein cholesterol level <35 mg/dL or triglycerides > 250 mg/dL
- Polycystic ovarian syndrome
- A1c≥5.7%
- Impaired glucose tolerance
- Impaired fasting glucose on previous testing
- History of cardiovascular disease
- Ability to attend group prenatal visits at specified days and times
- Willingness to be randomized
- Ability to give informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Type 2 diabetes (eligible for Diabetes Group Care)
- Positive glucose challenge test during early pregnancy
- Multiple gestation (require extra care)
- Major fetal anomaly (require extra care)
- Serious medical co-morbidity necessitating more care than can be safely provided in group setting, as deemed by medical provider (require extra care)
- Serious psychiatric illness, including schizophrenia, necessitating more care than can be safely provided in group setting, as deemed by medical provider (require extra care)
